00025     template< class IdTraits, class Cmp=std::less<typename IdTraits::id_type> >
00026     struct id_cmp {
00027       Cmp m_cmp;
00028     public:
00029       typedef typename IdTraits::base_type base_type;
00030       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type  id_type;
00031 
00036       id_cmp(Cmp const &cmp)
00037        :m_cmp(cmp) {}
00038       
00049       bool operator()(base_type const &a, base_type const &b) const {
00050        return m_cmp(IdTraits::get_id(a), IdTraits::get_id(b));
00051       }
00062       bool operator()(id_type const &a, base_type const &b) const {
00063        return m_cmp(a, IdTraits::get_id(b));
00064       }
00075       bool operator()(base_type const &a, id_type const &b) const {
00076        return m_cmp(IdTraits::get_id(a), b);
00077       }
00078     }; // TREX::utils::id_cmp<>

00091     template<class IdTraits, class Ty>
00092     struct map_id_traits {
00093       typedef std::pair<typename IdTraits::base_type, Ty>     base_type;
00094       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type                      id_type;
00095       typedef typename boost::call_traits<id_type>::param_type return_type;
00096       
00103       static return_type get_id(base_type const &p) {
00104        return IdTraits::get_id(p.first);
00105       }
00106     }; // TREX::utils::map_id_traits<>

00120     template<class IdTraits, class Ptr=typename IdTraits::base_type *>
00121     struct pointer_id_traits {
00122       typedef Ptr                         base_type;
00123       typedef typename boost::call_traits<base_type>::param_type argument_type;
00124       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type  id_type;
00125       typedef typename boost::call_traits<id_type>::param_type return_type;
00126 
00133       static return_type get_id(argument_type ptr) {
00134        return IdTraits::get_id(*ptr);
00135       }       
00136     }; // TREX::utils::pointer_id_traits<>

00194     template<class IdTraits, class Cmp=std::less<typename IdTraits::id_type> >
00195     class id_mapper {
00200       id_cmp<IdTraits, Cmp> m_cmp;
00201 
00202     public:
00203       typedef typename IdTraits::base_type                     base_type;
00208       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type                       id_type;
00214       typedef typename boost::call_traits<id_type>::param_type reference;
00215       
00223       id_mapper(Cmp const &cmp = Cmp())
00224        :m_cmp(cmp) {}
00226       ~id_mapper() {}
00227 
00228 
00244       template<class Iter>
00245       bool before(Iter x, reference id) const {
00246        return m_cmp(*x, id);
00247       }
00263       template<class Iter>
00264       bool after(Iter x, reference id) const {
00265        return m_cmp(id, *x);
00266       }
00267 
00286       template<class Iter>
00287       Iter lower_bound(Iter from, Iter to, reference id) const {
00288        for( ; to!=from && before(from, id); ++from);
00289        
00290        return from;
00291       }
00292 
00311       template<class Iter>
00312       Iter upper_bound(Iter from , Iter to, reference id) const {
00313        for( ; to!=from && !after(from, id); ++from);
00314        
00315        return from;
00316       }
00317     }; // TREX::utils::id_mapper

00337     template< class IdTraits, class Cmp=std::less<typename IdTraits::id_type> >
00338     class list_set {
00339     public:
00344       typedef typename IdTraits::base_type value_type;
00349       typedef typename IdTraits::id_type   key_type;
00350 
00351     private: 
00363       typedef std::list<value_type> container_type;
00364 
00365       container_type           m_list;   
00366       id_mapper<IdTraits, Cmp> m_mapper; 
00367     public:
00368       typedef typename container_type::size_type       size_type;
00369       typedef typename container_type::difference_type difference_type;
00370       typedef typename container_type::iterator        iterator; 
00371       typedef typename container_type::const_iterator const_iterator; 
00372 
00377       list_set() {}
00384       list_set(list_set const &other) 
00385        :m_list(other.m_list) {}
00397       template<class Iter>
00398       list_set(Iter from, Iter to) {
00399        for( ; to!=from; ++from) 
00400          insert(*from);
00401       }
00403       ~list_set() {}
00404 
00410       bool empty() const {
00411        return m_list.empty();
00412       }
00413 
00418       size_type size() const {
00419        return m_list.size();
00420       }
00421 
00430       iterator begin() {
00431        return m_list.begin();
00432       }
00441       iterator end() {
00442        return m_list.end();
00443       }
00452       const_iterator begin() const {
00453        return m_list.begin();
00454       }
00463       const_iterator end() const {
00464        return m_list.end();
00465       }
00466 
00482       iterator lower_bound(key_type const &k) {
00483        return m_mapper.lower_bound(begin(), end(), k);
00484       }
00485       const_iterator lower_bound(key_type const &k) const {
00486        return m_mapper.lower_bound(begin(), end(), k);
00487       }
00505       iterator lower_bound(value_type const &v) {
00506        return lower_bound(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00507       }
00508       const_iterator lower_bound(value_type const &v) const { 
00509        return lower_bound(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00510       }
00528       iterator upper_bound(key_type const &k) {
00529        return m_mapper.upper_bound(begin(), end(), k);
00530       }
00531       const_iterator upper_bound(key_type const &k) const {
00532        return m_mapper.upper_bound(begin(), end(), k);
00533       }
00552       iterator upper_bound(value_type const &v) {
00553        return upper_bound(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00554       }
00555       const_iterator upper_bound(value_type const &v) const {
00556        return upper_bound(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00557       }
00579       std::pair<iterator, iterator> equal_range(key_type const &k) {
00580        iterator end_p = end(),
00581          pos = m_mapper.lower_bound(begin(), end_p, k);
00582        return std::make_pair(pos, m_mapper.upper_bound(pos, end_p, k));
00583       }       
00584       std::pair<const_iterator, const_iterator> equal_range(key_type const &k) const {
00585        const_iterator end_p = end(),
00586          pos = m_mapper.lower_bound(begin(), end_p, k);
00587        return std::make_pair(pos, m_mapper.upper_bound(pos, end_p, k));
00588       }
00611       std::pair<iterator, iterator> equal_range(value_type const &v) {
00612        return equal_range(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00613       }       
00614       std::pair<const_iterator, const_iterator> equal_range(value_type const &v) const {
00615        return equal_range(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00616       }
00634       std::pair<iterator, bool> insert(value_type const &v) {
00635        iterator from, to;
00636        bool inserted = false;
00637 
00638        boost::tie(from, to) = equal_range(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00639        if( from==to ) {
00640          from = m_list.insert(from, v);
00641          inserted = true;
00642        }
00643        return std::make_pair(from, inserted);
00644       }
00645       
00660       iterator find(key_type const &k) {
00661        iterator from, to;
00662        
00663        boost::tie(from, to) = equal_range(k);
00664        if( from==to ) 
00665          return end();
00666        return from;
00667       }
00668       const_iterator find(key_type const &k) const {
00669        const_iterator from, to;
00670        
00671        boost::tie(from, to) = equal_range(k);
00672        if( from==to ) 
00673          return end();
00674        return from;
00675       }
00692       iterator find(value_type const &v) {
00693        return find(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00694       }
00695       const_iterator find(value_type const &v) const {
00696        return find(IdTraits::get_id(v));
00697       }
00708       iterator erase(iterator pos) {
00709        return m_list.erase(pos);
00710       }
00720       iterator erase(iterator from, iterator to) {
00721        return m_list.erase(from, to);
00722       }
00732       iterator erase(key_type const &k) {
00733        iterator from, to;
00734        
00735        boost::tie(from ,to) = equal_range(k);
00736        return erase(from, to);
00737       }
00738 
00743       void clear() {
00744        m_list.clear();
00745       }
00746 
00747       value_type const &front() const {
00748        return m_list.front();
00749       }
00750       value_type &front() {
00751        return m_list.front();
00752       }
00753       void pop_front() {
00754        m_list.pop_front();
00755       }

00757     }; // TREX::utils::list_set
